name: Sardec, Incorporated, Appellant, v. Williamsport Redevelopment Authority
name_abbreviation: Sardec, Inc. v. Williamsport Redevelopment Authority

judges: Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy and Nix, JJ.
Mr. Justice Manderino took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: Sardec, Incorporated, Appellant, v. Williamsport Redevelopment Authority.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed. Each party to pay own costs.
Mr. Justice Manderino took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Carl F. Meyer, with him Meyer, Darragh, Buckler, Bebenek & Eck, for appellant.
Richard II. Roesgen, with him McNerney, Page, Vanderlin & Hall, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Sardec, Incorporated, Appellant, v. Williamsport Redevelopment Authority.
Argued April 22, 1974.
Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy and Nix, JJ.
Carl F. Meyer, with him Meyer, Darragh, Buckler, Bebenek & Eck, for appellant.
Richard II. Roesgen, with him McNerney, Page, Vanderlin & Hall, for appellee.
July 1, 1974:
